text: Caillou's Holiday Movie is a 2003 animated children's movie. It was released on October 7, 2003. It is based on the Caillou TV show. It is the first Caillou movie to be released. == Reception == DVDtalk said the movie contained “positive messages” that its "image quality" was "excellent". == References == Category:2003 movies Category:Movies based on TV series
title: Caillou's Holiday Movie
